title: Avoiding Dangerous Snow Cornices
brief: How to identify and avoid snow cornices that can break away from ridges.
steps: Step 1: Identify cornices as overhanging piles of snow on the lee side of ridges.
Step 2: Stay well back from ridge edges where cornices may extend far out.
Step 3: Approach ridges from the windward side when possible.
Step 4: If you must cross near cornices, stay as far from the edge as terrain allows.
warnings: Cornices can extend much farther from the ridge than they appear.
Stepping on a cornice can cause it to break away, taking you with it.
The break line may be farther back from the visible edge than expected.
